Text.content: The category widget provides a category selection in a comfortable way.

Image.Title: To show the category selection dialog shown in the figure, click on the box where the currently chosen categories are shown.

Text.content:
The category widget is automatically assigned to elements of the type OpenCmsCategory and OpenCmsDynamicCategory which will enable storage of multiple selections.

For legacy reasons it is still possible to layout elements of the type OpenCmsVfsFile with the category widget, but then you wonâ€™t be able to make a multi selection.
